description: Requests an authentication token from Amazon GameLift for a compute resource in an Amazon GameLift fleet. Game servers that are running on the compute use this token to communicate with the Amazon GameLift service, such as when calling the Amazon GameLift server SDK action InitSDK(). Authentication tokens are valid for a limited time span, so you need to request a fresh token before the current token expires.

parameters.name: FleetId
parameters.description: A unique identifier for the fleet that the compute is registered to.

parameters.name: ComputeName
parameters.description: The name of the compute resource you are requesting the authentication token for. For an Anywhere fleet compute, use the registered compute name. For an EC2 fleet instance, use the instance ID.

nested_items.name: FleetId
nested_items.description: A unique identifier for the fleet that the compute is registered to.

nested_items.name: FleetArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name ( ARN) that is assigned to a Amazon GameLift fleet resource and uniquely identifies it. ARNs are unique across all Regions. Format is arn:aws:gamelift:<region>::fleet/fleet-a1234567-b8c9-0d1e-2fa3-b45c6d7e8912.

nested_items.name: ComputeName
nested_items.description: The name of the compute resource that the authentication token is issued to.

nested_items.name: ComputeArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name ( ARN) that is assigned to an Amazon GameLift compute resource and uniquely identifies it. ARNs are unique across all Regions. Format is arn:aws:gamelift:<region>::compute/compute-a1234567-b8c9-0d1e-2fa3-b45c6d7e8912.

nested_items.name: ExpirationTimestamp
nested_items.description: The amount of time until the authentication token is no longer valid.
